name: Nuren
greetingText: Do you Know the date? It's 7th December !
wishText: Dear Brave Nuren , May you have such an incredibly special birthday that starts and ends with love, and Peace of Mind. Happy Birthday! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many returns of the day Nuren.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Spending time with you is my favorite part of the day.
replayText: You're insanely soft hearted women and always always strong from brain.
